oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Captain Eddie Rickenbacker at Berry Field, Nashville, Tennessee, 1950 June
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three unidentified men at Berry Field anticipating the welcome of Captain Eddie Rickenbacker to Nashville, Tennessee, circa June 1950. The famous aviator was met at the airport by city officials, the media, and admiring fans upon his arrival via an Eastern Airlines jet. Edward “Eddie” Vernon Rickenbacker was an American fighter ace in World War I and Medal of Honor recipient. Rickenbacker became General Manager of Eastern Airlines circa 1933, and in 1938, with a group of investors, bought the company and became its president, managing the enterprise profitably for twenty years. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rickenbacker, Eddie, 1890-1973
